FOLDER.NAME: Shared_Rebates_RCI
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Shared folder for Rebates RCI Objects

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Date - 02/19/2014 Project - ITPR005898 State of NY – Rebates Payment processing.
MAPPING.NAME: m_Insert_TRBAT_PURG_EVNT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This will simply add 1 to the retention range number on the rule, then send that to the mapplet for finding the associated periods.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Retention_Range_lookup_format

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the number of periods that need to be RETAINED after processing. When counting this value backwards in periods, the current period (whether it be a quarter or month or year) is not included in the count.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: i_RTNTN_RANGE_NB

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: add 1 to the retention range. This is the actual period we will be working with for the event actions.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: i_RTNTN_RANGE_NB + 1
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_RTNTN_RANGE_NB

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Return datapartition name from SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS based on schema name, table name, low value and high value,
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DATAPARTITIONS

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS.DATAPARTITIONNAME AS DATAPARTITIONNAME , RTRIM(LTRIM(SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS.TABSCHEMA)) AS TABSCHEMA ,RTRIM(LTRIM(SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS.TABNAME)) AS TABNAME , REPLACE(LTRIM(RTRIM(SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS.LOWVALUE)), '''', '') AS LOWVALUE , REPLACE(LTRIM(RTRIM(SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS.HIGHVALUE)), '''', '') AS HIGHVALUE FROM SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS -- the REPLACE is for removing the single quotes from the data

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TABSCHEMA = in_SCHEMA_NM AND TABNAME = in_TBL_NM AND LOWVALUE = in_PURG_RANGE_LOW_VAL_TX AND HIGHVALUE = in_PURG_RANGE_HIGH_VAL_TX

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: To verify if TBL_NM and SCHEMA_NM in for the TRBAT_PURG_RULE are valid names by verifying the entry in SYSCAT.TABLES.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_SYSCATTABLES

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT ltrim(rtrim(SYSCAT.TABLES.TABSCHEMA)) as TABSCHEMA, ltrim(rtrim(SYSCAT.TABLES.TABNAME)) as TABNAME FROM SYSCAT.TABLES

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: call ABORT if the TBL_NM and SCHEMA_NM entered in the table RPS.TRBAT_PURG_RULE are not valid.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
iif(isnull(Lkp_TABNAME), ABORT('The SCHEMA.TABLE_NAME passed in for PURG_RULE_ID:'||to_char(PURG_RULE_ID)||' is not valid.'))
--iif(isnull(Lkp_TABNAME), ABORT('The'|| SCHEMA_NM||'.'||TBL_NM||'passed in for PURG_RULE_ID:'||PURG_RULE_ID||' is not valid.'))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: TABNAME_invalid_check

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the table structure code, and can be found in the TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 212. There are two structures, partitioned and non-partitioned tables.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: TBL_STRTR_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is an indicator showing whether or not the data for this rule needs to be archived or not. If this value is set to 1, then the mapping needs to build a SELECT statement in the event table SLCT_STMNT_TX port.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ARCHV_IN

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is an indicator showing whether or not the data for this rule needs to be deleted or not. If this value is set to 1, then the mapping needs to build a DELETE statement in the event table DEL_STMNT_TX port.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: DEL_IN

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the number of periods that need to be RETAINED after processing. When counting this value backwards in periods, the current period (whether it be a quarter or month or year) is not included in the count.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: RTNTN_RANGE_NB

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This tells the process what kinds of periods it is running for 1 = Monthly 2 = Quarterly
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: RTNTN_PRD_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the column from the table in the rule that the process is driven from. This is the key field used in the selection and deletion of data for the event.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ACTN_COL_NM

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is tied to the ACTN_COL_NM, and refers to the TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 216. This tells the proces what kind of formatted periods are in the table and what it has to build for the processing of that rule.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the code value from TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 213. This process will not run for cd_nb = 1, manual. This value will be filtered on in the session. 1 = manual 2 = monthly 3 = quarterly
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: JOB_RUN_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For partitioned tables, this gets the month that the processing date is going to work on
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: ADD_TO_DATE (sysdate, 'MONTH',-(RTNTN_RANGE_NB + 1))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the rule is for a partitioned table using month or timestamp, get the Low range value for a calendar month which is the first day of the month being processed.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 OR ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2 -- date or TIMESTAMP ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt,'MM')||'/01/'||TO_CHAR(v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt,'YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') -- subtract the number of months to remove ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_Low_Date

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the rule is for a partitioned table using month or timestamp, get the high range value for a calendar month which is the first day of the NEXT calender month being processed. See the variable v_Range_High_Date_inclusive_exclusive
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 OR ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2 -- date or timestamp ,LAST_DAY(v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt) -- subtract the number of months and find last day of that month ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_High_Date

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The way the DBA's build partitioned tables (normally) is by using a date or timestamp spanning a month. The HIGH range value for each partition, EXCEPT for the month of December, is the first day of the next month, and they use the word EXCLUSIVE for that partition. For December defintions, though, they use the last day of December and use the word INCLUSIVE. This variable checks to see if the month being calculated is December or not. If it is not December, it must assume that the HIGH value is the first day of the next month, so it adds 1 day to the calculated date. If it IS the month of December, it must assume that the HIGH value is the last day of December.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 -- the table partition HIGH range should be the last day of the month ,IIF(TO_CHAR(v_Range_High_Date,'MM') = '12' ,TO_CHAR(v_Range_High_Date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_CHAR(ADD_TO_DATE(v_Range_High_Date,'DD',1),'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2 -- you have to add 1 day to the HIGH date to get the first day of the next month ,TO_CHAR(ADD_TO_DATE(v_Range_High_Date,'DAY',1),'YYYY-MM-DD')||'-00.00.00.000000' ,NULL )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_High_Date_inclusive_exclusive

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Format Purge Low Range value (v_Range_Low_Date). If ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=1 (Date): Format Low Range value to date format YYYY-MM-DD. Note: date format YYYY-MM-DD is used to get the match from SYSCAT.DataPartitions table. If ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=2 (Timestamp): Format Low Range value to timestamp format YYYY-MM-DD|| 00:00:00.000000. Note: date format YYYY-MM-DD is used to get the match from SYSCAT.DataPartitions table.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: Decode (TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 -- regardless of partitioned or not, need first day of the month for the LOW RANGE , TO_CHAR(v_Range_Low_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2 , TO_CHAR(v_Range_Low_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||'-00.00.00.000000' )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_Low_lkp_formatted

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Format Purge Low Range value (v_Range_High_Date). If ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=1 (Date): Format High Range value to date format YYYY-MM-DD. Note: date format YYYY-MM-DD is used to get the match from SYSCAT.DataPartitions table. If ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=2 (Timestamp): Format High Range value to timestamp format YYYY-MM-DD|| 00:00:00.000000. Note: date format YYYY-MM-DD is used to get the match from SYSCAT.DataPartitions table.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: Decode (TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 , v_Range_High_Date_inclusive_exclusive ,NULL )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_High_lkp_formatted

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For partition drop request, get the partition name from SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS based on table name, schema name, low value and high value.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
iif(TBL_STRTR_CD =1 -- partitioned table , :LKP.LKP_DATAPARTITIONS(LTRIM(RTRIM(SCHEMA_NM)),LTRIM(RTRIM(TBL_NM)),v_Range_Low_lkp_formatted, v_Range_High_lkp_formatted) ,NULL) -- TBL_STRTR_CD != 1
-- this is for partitioned tables only. Partitioned tables will not have multiple monthly periods or quarterly periods, they will be ranges.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_PRTN_NM

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: call ABORT if the TBL_NM and SCHEMA_NM entered in the table RPS.TRBAT_PURG_RULE are not valid.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,TBL_STRTR_CD = 1 ,iif(isnull(v_PRTN_NM), ABORT('The PURG_RULE_ID number >'||PURG_RULE_ID||'< could not determine the partition name to process for. LOW range = >'||v_Range_Low_lkp_formatted||'< and the HIGH range = >'||v_Range_High_lkp_formatted||'.') ,NULL) )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_PRTN_NM_invalid_check

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(TBL_STRTR_CD = 2, Decode (TRUE ,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 3, CHR(039)||MFMT_PREV_MONTH||CHR(039) ,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 4, CHR(039)||QFMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039) ,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 5, CHR(039)||M1FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M2FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M3FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||QFMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039) ,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 6, CHR(039)||M1FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M2FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M3FMT_PREV_QTR||CHR(039) ,RTNTN_PRD_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 7, CHR(039)||TO_CHAR(v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt,'YYYYMM')||CHR(039) ,RTNTN_PRD_CD = 2 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 7, CHR(039)||M1YYYYMM_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M2YYYYMM_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)||','||CHR(039)||M3YYYYMM_PREV_QTR||CHR(039)) ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_PURG_RANGE_MULT_TX

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If TBL_STRTR_CD =1 (Partition), set the value to New. If TBL_STRTR_CD =2 (Non Partition), set the value to Pending.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,ARCHV_IN=1,10 -- this needs to be checked first. If both ARCHV_IN and DEL_IN = 1, then archive still has to happen first ,DEL_IN = 1, 20 )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: PURG_ACTN_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For timestamp case (ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=2) and partition table (TBL_STRTR_CD =1), get LOWVALUE from lookup LKP_DATAPARTITIONS_TS_LOWVALUE based on schema name, table name and partition name.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(TBL_STRTR_CD =1 ,CHR(039)||v_Range_Low_lkp_formatted||CHR(039) ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_Low_Val_Tx

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For timestamp case (ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=2) and partition table (TBL_STRTR_CD =1), get LOWVALUE from lookup LKP_DATAPARTITIONS_TS_LOWVALUE based on schema name, table name and partition name.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_PURG_RANGE_LOW_VAL_TX

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For timestamp case (Partition), get HIGHVALUE from lookup LKP_DATAPARTITIONS_TS_HIGHVALUE based on schema name, table name and partition name.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(TBL_STRTR_CD =1 ,CHR(039)||v_Range_High_lkp_formatted||CHR(039) ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Range_High_Val_Tx

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: For timestamp case (ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD=2) and partition table (TBL_STRTR_CD =1), get LOWVALUE from lookup LKP_DATAPARTITIONS_TS_LOWVALUE based on schema name, table name and partition name.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_PURG_RANGE_HIGH_VAL_TX

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is built by the script that will build the archive file and the compressed file.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ARCHV_FILE_NM_null

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the table structure code is partition, then the WHERE clause is a BETWEEN, else it will be an IN clause.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(TBL_STRTR_CD = 1,0,1)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_multiple_clause

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the filter criteria used in the WHERE clause, and it is built based on the table structure of the rule.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(TRUE ,v_multiple_clause , ' IN ('||v_PURG_RANGE_MULT_TX||')'
,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 -- DATE, should be BETWEEN ,' BETWEEN '||v_Range_Low_Val_Tx||' AND '||v_Range_High_Val_Tx
,ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2 -- timestamp, should be >= low and < (NOT equal to) high ,' >= '||v_Range_Low_Val_Tx||' AND '||ACTN_COL_NM||' < '||v_Range_High_Val_Tx )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Filter_Clause

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the WHERE clause for the upcoming SELECT and DELETE statement builds.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: ' WHERE '||ACTN_COL_NM|| v_Filter_Clause ||' ' ||ADTN_FLTR_CRTR_TX
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Where_Clause

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the archive indicator is on, then an export needs to be executed (see unix scripts that run with this process), and that export uses this select statement. If the archive indicator is off, then the rule does not need to have data saved (via archive), only deleted.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE, ARCHV_IN, 'SELECT * FROM '||SCHEMA_NM||'.'||TBL_NM||v_Where_Clause||';', NULL )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_SLCT_STMNT_TX

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the table structure code is 1, it's a partitioned table and there will never be a need for a delete statement to be issued, the partition will be detached and then dropped. If the table strucutre code is 2, then the data must be removed by running a delete statement, which is bult in this port.
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE, TBL_STRTR_CD = 2 AND DEL_IN, 'DELETE FROM '||SCHEMA_NM||'.'||TBL_NM||v_Where_Clause||';', NULL )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_DEL_STMNT_TX

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(TRUE ,ARCHV_IN AND (ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 1 OR ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 2), TO_CHAR(v_Range_Low_Date,'YYYYMM') ,ARCHV_IN AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 3, MFMT_PREV_MONTH ,ARCHV_IN AND (ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 4 OR ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 5 OR ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 6), QFMT_PREV_QTR ,ARCHV_IN AND RTNTN_PRD_CD = 1 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 7, TO_CHAR(v_Month_Rule_Prcs_Dt,'YYYYMM') --YYYYMM ,ARCHV_IN AND RTNTN_PRD_CD = 2 AND ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD = 7, QFMT_YYYYQ9_PREV_QTR ,NULL)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_ARCHV_FILE_ADDON_NM

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the code value from TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 213. This process will not run for cd_nb = 1, manual. This value will be filtered on in the session. 1 = manual 2 = monthly 3 = quarterly
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: JOB_RUN_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This code value refers to the TVNDR_REBT_CD table TYP_CD = 208. This is the special process code and it prevents rules from being processed in this mapping that are CD_NB = 2, which is a specialized rule.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SPL_PRCS_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the table structure code, and can be found in the TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 212. There are two structures, partitioned and non-partitioned tables.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: TBL_STRTR_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is an indicator showing whether or not the data for this rule needs to be archived or not. If this value is set to 1, then the mapping needs to build a SELECT statement in the event table SLCT_STMNT_TX port.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ARCHV_IN

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is an indicator showing whether or not the data for this rule needs to be deleted or not. If this value is set to 1, then the mapping needs to build a DELETE statement in the event table DEL_STMNT_TX port.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: DEL_IN

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the number of periods that need to be RETAINED after processing. When counting this value backwards in periods, the current period (whether it be a quarter or month or year) is not included in the count.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: RTNTN_RANGE_NB

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the column from the table in the rule that the process is driven from. This is the key field used in the selection and deletion of data for the event.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ACTN_COL_NM

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is tied to the ACTN_COL_NM, and refers to the TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 216. This tells the proces what kind of formatted periods are in the table and what it has to build for the processing of that rule.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: ACTN_COL_FRMT_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the table size code and can be found in TVNDR_REBT_CD where the TYP_CD = 209. This field is used by the Archive and Delete scripts, not by this mapping.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: TBL_SZ_CD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Source Filter
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE.JOB_RUN_CD = $$JOB_RUN_CD and VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE.SPL_PRCS_CD = 1 -- batch processing and VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE.PURG_RULE_EFF_TS <= CURRENT TIMESTAMP and VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE.PURG_RULE_EXPRN_TS >= CURRENT TIMESTAMP

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This will simply add 1 to the retention range number on the rule, then send that to the mapplet for finding the associated periods.
INSTANCE.NAME: Retention_Range_lookup_format

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Return datapartition name from SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS based on schema name, table name, low value and high value,
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_DATAPARTITIONS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: To verify if TBL_NM and SCHEMA_NM in for the TRBAT_PURG_RULE are valid names by verifying the entry in SYSCAT.TABLES.
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_SYSCATTABLES

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: This is the TVNDR_REBT_CD where TYP_CD = 191
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$JOB_RUN_CD
